# Built application files
*.apk
*.ap_
*.aab

# Files for the ART/Dalvik VM
*.dex

# Java class files
*.class

# Generated files
bin/
gen/
out/
build/

# Gradle files
.gradle/
gradle/
gradlew
gradlew.bat

# Local configuration file
local.properties

# Android Studio files
.idea/
*.iml
.DS_Store
captures/
.externalNativeBuild
.cxx

# Keystore files
*.jks
*.keystore

# Google Services
google-services.json
